```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(rvest)
rm(list = ls())
wikiLink <- "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_U.S._states_by_median_home_price"
wikiPage <- read_html(wikiLink)
```
```{r}
wikiPage %>% html_nodes("table") 
```
```{r}
(homePriceData <- wikiPage %>% html_nodes("table") %>% .[2] %>% html_table() %>%.[[1]])
```
```{r}
(names(homePriceData)=gsub(" ","",names(homePriceData))) #removing space from our data 
```
```{r}
#gsub('-',NA,homePriceData$Staterank,fixed=TRUE)
```
```{r}
homePriceData$Staterank <- NULL #removing Staterank column 
```
```{r}
homePriceData
```
